constituent: hanging scroll, towel, wealth, one, ceiling, mouth, rice field, brains
heisigStory: A towel owned by the wealthiest tycoon in the world is made into a hanging scroll after his death and auctioned off to the highest bidder.
koohiiStory1: In the west, the rich use $100 bills to light their cigars... In Japan, after showering, when the wealthy don´t have any clean towels, they simply grab a hanging scroll off the wall and use it to dry off!
koohiiStory2: The towels of the wealthy: hanging scrolls.
myStory: tranh cuộn treo. khăn của nhà giàu là bức tranh lụa treo tường
